column5: Temple Texas two story home.   Mixed use space work downstairs and live upstairs. Downstairs two desks and printer for your use with comfy chairs and wifi enabledcomfortable clean kitchen and eating area know Asian meals are cooked there.   Upstairs is an open living area and bedroom available for rental. Room is clean but sparsely decorated and functional but not luxurious. Lots of quiet space. Until we get new carpet stairs are well loved. See pictures.
